screenDescription: The purpose of the modal is to display a notice or announcement to the user. It includes a close button, a link, and an option to not show the notice for a day.
actionDescription: The system clicked the "닫기" button to close the modal notice.

screenDescription: The webpage appears to be a movie theater website, designed to provide information about current movies, events, and promotions, as well as allow users to book tickets and access other features of the website.
actionDescription: The system clicked the "예매" button to navigate to the ticket booking section of the website.

screenDescription: The webpage is designed for movie ticket reservation, allowing users to browse and select popular movies, choose a theater or movie to watch, and book private screenings at the COEX theater.
actionDescription: The system did not select any movie option from the list.
